short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop with confidence.  We make sure you never miss an opportunity to earn rewards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kiwii is a free tool that helps you shop with confidence so you know you’re getting the most rewards out of all your purchases.

Just add Kiwii to your browser and shop like normal. We’ll be there to make sure you’re always maximizing every dollar you spend online.

There are tons of ways to earn extra rewards when you shop, but you need to know where to look. Our algorithm takes all the cash back, points and miles programs out there and shows you the best deals for the programs that matter to you.

Then when you’re ready to check out, we’ll show you which one of your credit cards will earn the most back so you can make an informed choice on every purchase.

💪 Discover awesome deals

    - Kiwii covers thousands of sites and programs that offer extra 
    cash back, credit card points or airline miles (things like 20% 
    back or 10x miles 🥂)
    - We’ll show you the best options so you can rack up those 
    savings 💸

✈️ Leverage your existing loyalty programs

    - Get more engaged with the programs you care about like 
    airlines you like to fly or hotels you prefer to stay

🧘‍♀️ Stop stressing & always use the right card

    - Don’t worry about which card to use when and where – we’ve 
    got you covered!

🔍 Find new cards based on how you shop

    - We'll also show you the best card out there for your favorite 
    stores
    - You might just find a new best friend! (for your wallet 🫶)

It’s simple and you don’t have to link any accounts (we don’t like to share ours either 😉).

Join our community and supercharge your rewards when you shop online with Kiwii!
